board_desc: Middle-earth chessboard. Dark squares are shadowy Mordor terrain with cracked volcanic rock, ash, and glowing embers from Mount Doom in the distance. Light squares are pristine Gondorian white stone tiles with elvish runes and intricate carvings, showing the ancient craftsmanship of Númenor. Back rows (1 and 8) feature the great halls of Minas Tirith on one side and the dark towers of Barad-dûr on the other. Middle rows (2-7) show the battlefield terrain between good and evil. Top-down orthographic view, epic fantasy lighting with dramatic shadows, photorealistic textures, 8k resolution. Majestic and foreboding atmosphere.
piece_desc: Lord of the Rings characters in detailed realistic fantasy style. WHITE PIECES (The Fellowship): White King: Aragorn as King Elessar with Andúril sword, crown of Gondor, regal armor, noble bearing. White Queen: Arwen Evenstar in elven robes with the Evenstar pendant, ethereal beauty, flowing dark hair. White Bishops: Gandalf the White with his staff and Glamdring sword, long white beard, pointed hat, mystical aura. White Knights: Legolas Greenleaf on horseback with elven bow drawn, blonde hair, keen eyes, graceful stance. White Rooks: The White Tower of Ecthelion (Minas Tirith). White Pawns: Hobbit warriors with Sting swords. BLACK PIECES (Sauron's Forces): Black King: Sauron in dark armor with the One Ring visible, menacing presence, dark lord of Mordor. Black Queen: The Witch-king of Angmar on fell beast, crown of Morgul, dark robes, terrifying presence. Black Bishops: Saruman the White (corrupted) with his staff of Isengard. Black Knights: Nazgûl riders on black horses, dark cloaks, glowing eyes, wielding morgul blades. Black Rooks: The Dark Tower of Barad-dûr, ominous and foreboding, surrounded by darkness. Black Pawns: Orc warriors with crude weapons, Uruk-hai with armor and pikes. RENDER STYLE: Photorealistic textures matching Peter Jackson's film aesthetic, epic fantasy lighting, dramatic shadows. White pieces: heroic, noble, with elven and human craftsmanship. Black pieces: corrupted, dark, industrial evil. All pieces rendered individually with consistent scale ratios, maintaining Middle-earth atmosphere while recognizable as chess pieces.
anim_desc: Lord of the Rings style epic fantasy battle captures - cinematic, heroic, with sword combat, magic, and dramatic moments. Animations feel like scenes from the films. White pieces (Fellowship) capture with heroic precision - sword strikes, elven arrows, magical blasts, or tactical maneuvers. Black pieces (Sauron's forces) capture using dark magic, overwhelming numbers, brutal orc attacks, or fell beast strikes. Aragorn (White King) approaches with Andúril raised, delivers a decisive sword strike, or calls upon the Army of the Dead. Arwen (White Queen) uses elven magic to bind enemies, or strikes with ethereal grace. Gandalf (White Bishops) unleashes blinding white light, staff strikes, or calls down lightning. Legolas (White Knights) fires precise elven arrows that find their mark, or performs acrobatic strikes. White Rooks: Towers unleash volleys of arrows or magical defenses. Hobbit Pawns: Sting glows blue, precise strikes, or clever tactical moves. Sauron (Black King): Dark magic blasts, overwhelming power, or the Eye's gaze. Witch-king (Black Queen): Morgul blade strikes, fell beast attacks, or dark sorcery. Saruman (Black Bishops): Dark magic, staff blasts, or corrupted power. Nazgûl (Black Knights): Terrifying charges, morgul blade strikes, or fell beast dives. Black Rooks: Dark towers unleash siege weapons or dark magic. Orc Pawns: Overwhelming numbers, brutal attacks, or crude but effective strikes. ROYALTY: White King/Queen ATTACKING: Epic heroic moments - Andúril glows, elven magic surges, heroic determination. White King/Queen DYING: Noble sacrifice - falls with honor, light fades, but hope remains. Black King/Queen ATTACKING: Overwhelming darkness - dark magic surges, the Eye's power, corruption spreads. Black King/Queen DYING: Dark power fails - armor cracks, darkness recedes, evil defeated. All animations equal length (3-5 seconds), cinematic fantasy lighting, high-detail textures with Middle-earth aesthetic, epic and heroic tone matching Lord of the Rings universe.
